course_title: The Bible, Race, and Reception History
class_notes: (HYFLEX: students may arrange directly with the instructor to attend in person or via live remote participation for the semester in advance; class meets Tuesdays and Thursdays 10:00am-11:20am)
course_description: This course looks at the reception history of the Bible, in particular in light of issues of race.
